ygData.subject: RE: RE: Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Doh!  Must have been 17 when I dueled the shaman cause I remember trying it with and without duel wield.  I did better with the shield than I did with my
ygData.messageBody:
Doh! Must have been 17 when I dueled the shaman cause I remember trying it
with and without duel wield. I did better with the shield than I did with
my scimitar/dirk combo. 15 points of AC seemed much better than the extra
damage from the scimitar, might do better with a better second wepon but
would still never win I did only 3 bubbles before I died the best of the two
fights.

-----Original Message-----
From: Llewrend Lynnhaven [mailto:lordartos@...]
Sent: Monday, September 27, 1999 10:11 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Bards


From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>

Hmm, that is very level specific. Melee them after
you get your duel wield at 17. And cast fight the
ranger after you have see invis at 19 or root and fear
when you get them.
